forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower is possible early. Cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
